subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets, whose 49-33 record carried them to the top of the Atlantic Division, are set to appear five times each on ESPN and TNT, eight times on NBA TV and once on ABC.
snippet: The Nets, whose 49-33 record carried them to the top of the Atlantic Division, are set to appear five times each on ESPN and TNT, eight times on NBA TV and once on ABC.
